name: Deep Dungeon (itch) (Clickteam)
description:
The hero of our tale was simply trying to enjoy his recently cooked and incredibly savory hot dog right before it was stolen. It seems they left the door unlocked to the endless dungeon he has in Kitchen. Now (of course) he is going to have to go down and retrieve it. What a pain.

Features

  • Random Dungeon level creation
  • Key and chest engine (2 powerups so far)
  • Simple but effective enemy AI, three types currently
  • Gauntlet like Nests where enemies are generated

How to play

Players must dive deeper and deeper, surviving each dungeon level. Find the door to the next level but to get it open you must destroy all the nests. 

  • You can push Skeletons and Knights
  • Don't touch the Spiders!
  • Each potion you pick up restores two hearts
  • Use the doors to your advantage

Using the Awesome Dungeon tileset by Zapchi

https://zapchi.itch.io/fantasy-top-down-pixel-art-tileset
